title: Why Staff Health Is A Blind Spot for Most Lead Pastors
description:
Toxic? Empowering? Fear-Driven? Collaborative? The team culture you have is the one you built. But that doesn't mean your impression of it is accurate. What if you're the last to know your church staff culture is not what you thought?

In Season 1, Episode 6 of The Leadership Unstuck Podcast, Tony, Ryan and Amy talk about span of care, healthy pace of life in ministry and other practical steps to grow a healthy team... because most lead pastors aren't thinking about staff health.

Show Links:

7 Questions that Measure Team Culture

Measuring the Health of Your Senior Leadership Team

Take Time Off: 4 Guidelines for Establishing Healthy Pace of Life for Staff

7 Warning Signs Your Church Has Ministry Silos

5 Dysfunctions of a Team Resources
